content: **knitted neck warmer for men in drops daisy or drops karisma piece is knitted bottom up with stocking stitch and rib ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #cremecaramelneckwarmer drops design pattern da-048 yarn group b ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** s/m m/l l//xl shoulder width approx 31-34-37 cm length from shoulder and down approx 26-28-30 cm **yarn** drops daisy from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 200-200-250 g colour 13 almond or use drops karisma from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 200-250-250 g colour 91 almond **needles** drops circular needle size 4 mm length 40 and 60 cm drops circular needle size 3 mm length 40 cm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need circular needle of 80 cm in each size **knitting gauge** 21 stitches in width and 28 row vertically in stocking stitch on needle size 4 mm = 10 x 10 cm remember needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger sized needles or if you get too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller sized needles
